name: ext_R4B_ImmunizationRecommendation_recommendation
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImmunizationRecommendation|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` maps to R2 `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.protocol` maps to R2 `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.protocol`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
